data.message: I like Eminem grew up listening to him and have memorized many of his lyrics, but I will not choose him over the President of the nation I am a citizen and patriot of.

replies.message: I believe we all say good fuck you then.

You know that having a title doesn't automatically give you respect? You can be patriotic and disagree with the President's choices or leadership. You can even do it without hating or getting angry at either the President or the opposing political party. Give it a shot.

Arjen Kane yes I knew that and I do think for myself, not angry at all I voiced my opinion on how I feel about it. I don’t agree with all the president does but he is leading our nation, not some fourty year old druggie rapper. Just because people around you are opinion less zombies that don’t stick up for what they believe in doesn’t mean I am 100% for or against anything and to state without knowing yourself is ignorance.
how many of you that liked this are actually from America lmao
Amukelani Young Amunation Aubrey mad you’re not allowed in America anymore? Lmao
Aaron Brown doesn’t mean shit to me most of y’all aren’t even from this country lmao
